### Advance Contract Award Notice

#### Title
Baseline Data on Intertidal Mudflat and Subtidal Cobble Communities on the Northwest Fundy Shore

#### Reference Information
**Tender Reference Number:** Cb-7931-57545468
**Solicitation Number:** 30004435
**Amendment Number:** 1

#### Announcement Details
This tender is for an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the Coastal Environmental Baseline Program, Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO).

#### Program Summary
The Coastal Environmental Baseline Program seeks to expand its site to focus on the Northwest Fundy Shore for 2023-2027. This program aims to collect baseline data on ecological gaps and components prioritized by program partners. Benthic communities are crucial for understanding the current state of the ecosystem in the Northwest Fundy Shore region.

#### Objective and Scope of Work
The contractor will be responsible for undertaking the following objectives and tasks:

* Objective 1: Quantify biodiversity and spatial and temporal variation in infaunal invertebrate communities and physicochemical characteristics of sediment at intertidal mudflat sites.
* Objective 2: Quantify biodiversity and spatial and temporal variation in shallow subtidal cobble communities using cobble-filled bio-collectors.

#### Deliverables and Acceptance Criteria
The contractor will deliver the following products and meet the following acceptance criteria:

* Interim reports describing activities completed and data available to date (March 2024, 2025, and 2026)
* Final report describing baseline data collected under each objective (March 2027)
* Data will be uploaded to the St. Lawrence Global Observatory (SLGO) website yearly as it is finalized

#### Tender Details
The tender is open to bids from qualified contractors. The estimated value of the contract is not disclosed.
